Functions
fza_fnc_targetIsADA
Description

Returns whether the object should be counted as air defence artillery.

Parameters
_unit

The unit to check.

Returns
Bool

whether the aircraft is Air Defence Artillery or not.

Examples

if ([_x] call fza_fnc_targetIsADA) then {

_ret = [_unit] call fza_fnc_targetIsADA
//_ret => true

mattysmith22
